venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Dark Shadows is about a Vampire, Barnabas Collins (Johnny Depp), who tries to adjust to life with his relatives in 1970s Maine. It's based on the cult-favorite soap opera from the '70s. The movie looks pretty funny.

Dark Shadows is playing at 5:05 at Blackstone Valley Cinema on Sunday, May 27. Let's meet in the lobby at 4:45. If you're around and want to see a movie and get something to eat afterwards, please join me.

Call or text my cell phone at 508-981-0455 if you need to reach me.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Dark Shadows
